alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 26 at 12:58PM MST until December 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Eddy County Plains. In Texas, Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor, and Eastern Culberson County. * WHEN...This morning through early this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust could temporarily reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County
